events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering for the Software Developer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to oversee your application for the software engineer role.
Your initial screening was successful, and we are interested in moving forward with your application.
Thank you for responding promptly to our screening questions; this helps us advance your application.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 2 PM to discuss your software engineering skills.
